trans-unit.source: Represents a reference to an index of an array.
<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeArrayIndexerExpression> can be used to represent a reference to an index of an array of one or more dimensions.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeArrayIndexerExpression> 可用來代表的一或多個維度的陣列索引的參考。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeIndexerExpression> for representing a reference to an index of a code (non-array) indexer.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeIndexerExpression>代表的程式碼 （非陣列） 的索引子索引的參考。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeArrayIndexerExpression.TargetObject%2A> property indicates the indexer object.

The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeArrayIndexerExpression.Indices%2A> property indicates either a single index within the target array, or a set of indexes that together specify a specific intersection of indexes across the dimensions of the array.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeArrayIndexerExpression.Indices%2A>屬性表示目標陣列中，可能是以單一索引或一組這兩者可一起索引陣列維度之間指定特定索引的交集。

trans-unit.source: The following code creates a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeArrayIndexerExpression> that references index 5 of an array of integers named `x` :
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼會建立<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeArrayIndexerExpression>參考索引的名為整數的陣列 5 `x` :

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeArrayIndexerExpression" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeArrayIndexerExpression" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeArrayIndexerExpression" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeArrayIndexerExpression" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression" /> that indicates the array the indexer targets.
The index or indexes to reference.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeArrayIndexerExpression" /> class using the specified target object and indexes.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的目標物件和索引來初始化 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeArrayIndexerExpression" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index or indexes of the indexer expression.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定索引子運算式的索引。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpressionCollection" /> that indicates the index or indexes of the indexer expression.

This <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeExpressionCollection> can contain a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression> that specifies a single index within the target array, or multiple <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression> objects that together specify a specific intersection of indexes across the dimensions of the array.
trans-unit.target: 這<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeExpressionCollection>可以包含<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression>，指定目標陣列中或多個以單一索引<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression>一起指定特定交集的索引陣列維度的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the target object of the array indexer.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個陣列索引子的目標物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression" /> that represents the array being indexed.

This property typically contains either a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeVariableReferenceExpression>, a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodePropertyReferenceExpression>, or a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeFieldReferenceExpression>.
